text:
Daria Nicolodi (19 June 1950 – 26 November 2020) was an Italian actress, producer and screenwriter. She was born in Florence, Italy. Her career began in 1970.
Her best known roles were in "Deep Red" (1975), "Inferno" (1980), "Tenebrae" (1982), "Phenomena" (1985), and "Opera" (1987).
Nicolodi died on 26 November 2020 in Rome at the age of 70.
